mapper.insert: insert into account_log (id, account_no, other_account_no, trans_amount, balance, currrncy, trans_code, sub_trans_code, trans_date, trans_dt, out_date, order_no, recon_inst , operator_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id}, #{accountNo}, #{otherAccountNo}, #{transAmount}, #{balance}, #{currency}, #{transCode}, #{subTransCode}, DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), NOW(), NOW(), #{orderNo}, #{reconInst}, #{operatorID} , NOW(), NOW())
